item.description:
The weather is going to be gorgeous this Sunday, so we should play some casual, fun beach volleyball! I was also thinking maybe we can do drinks/food and a hangout sort of thing (some friends of mine might come just to tan, haha). 

 

Also, I only have one net, but if someone else can bring another then I can add more people. We can have as many nets as we want, so if you have nets and volleyballs and are willing to share, please feel welcome (just be sure to let me know so I can increase the RSVP number).
item.how_to_find_us: Not sure yet- I think of some sort of landmark
item.name: Recreational/Low Intermediate Volleyball at Carson Beach
